data.comment: The match has started.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
In the minute 2, Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Puebla to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in San Luis.
Throw-in high up the field for San Luis in Puebla.
In the minute 8, Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for San Luis at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
San Luis takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 10, San Luis are coming forward and Anderson Julio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Puebla have a goal kick.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 13, Puebla takes a corner from the right.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for San Luis at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Puebla have been awarded a penalty...
Goal! Santiago Ormeno gives Puebla the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 28, Can Puebla capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Luis's half?
Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Daniel Alvarez for Puebla who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Daniel Alvarez is back on the pitch.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Puebla close to the penalty box.
In the minute 33, San Luis needs to be cautious. Puebla have an attacking throw-in.
Puebla have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Christian Tabo (Puebla) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for San Luis close to the penalty box.
In the minute 39, Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
San Luis needs to be cautious. Puebla have an attacking throw-in.
Nicolas Ibanez of San Luis gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Puebla.
San Luis drive forward but Pablo Barrera is judged offside.
In the minute 44, San Luis's Nicolas Ibanez misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Throw-in for Puebla close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Free kick for San Luis in the half of Puebla.
San Luis are pushing forward but Camilo Mayada's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 47, San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Omar Fernandez (Puebla) has received a first yellow card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Omar Fernandez.
In the minute 49, Omar Fernandez for Puebla is back on the field again.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Can San Luis capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Puebla's half?
In the minute 51, Free kick San Luis.
Puebla's Brayan Angulo has run offside.
Free kick in a good position for San Luis!
In the minute 53, Puebla have a goal kick.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Puebla's Christian Tabo is on target but unsuccessful.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Puebla in the half of San Luis.
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of San Luis.
San Luis to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
In the minute 66, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
Daniel Alvarez is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 67, Daniel Alvarez, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Daniel Aguilar is the substitute for Puebla.
Throw-in Puebla.
In the minute 71, Omar Fernandez of Puebla gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
Walter Castillo is on a sub for Diego Pineda for San Luis.
In the minute 73, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
San Luis are pushing forward but Nicolas Ibanez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 75, San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pablo Lopez is replacing Pablo Barrera for the away team.
Javier Salas is booked for the home team.
Christian Tabo for Puebla is whistled offside.
In the minute 78, Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The home team replace Omar Fernandez with Alejandro Chumacero.
Puebla make their third substitution with Bernardo Cuesta replacing Christian Tabo.
In the minute 79, Goal kick for San Luis at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
San Luis's Anderson Julio misses with an attempt on goal.
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Throw-in San Luis.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santiago Ormeno is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 84, Nestor Vicente Vidrio is on a sub for George Corral for Puebla.
Santiago Ormeno (Puebla) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Eduardo Herrera.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Puebla takes a corner from the left.
Throw-in high up the field for Puebla in Puebla.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Puebla.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
Felipe Garcia is replacing Anderson Julio for the away team.
